message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be very valuable to you. It's something that can significantly improve your operations and save you money in the long run. While I value this product at a minimum of $1,500,000, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount and an opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset at a favorable price. Please let me know if you're interested.
